content: विप्रलब्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Deceived, cheated. {@--2@} Disappointed. {@--3@} Hurt, injured. --ब्धा A woman disappointed by her lover's breaking his appointment; (one of the several classes of a Nāyikā in poetic composition); she is thus defined in <ls>S. D.</ls> : --प्रियः कृत्वापि संकेतं यस्या नायाति संनिधिम् . विप्रलब्धेति सा ज्ञेया नितांतमवमानिता .. <ls n="S. D.">118.</ls>
